Entries.Fri2: Today Abigail, Sam and I are going to the saloon.$0#$b#I think I'll ask Abigail to play Prairie King with me.$1
Entries.Sat2: Abigail is a great gaming partner.$1#$b#I'm looking forward to playing Solarion Chronicles with her soon.$0

Entries.Wed2: Sebastian's so good at Journey of the Prairie King.$1#$e#I've never played with him before and was so impressed.$0
Entries.Sun2: I can't wait for it to be Friday already.$0#$b#I'm asking Sebastian to play Journey of the Prairie King with me.$1

Entries.Tue4: I've seen that the mines are a dangerous place to go...$0
Entries.Fri4: I think Abigail's still affected after the incident we had at the cave the other day.$2
Entries.Sat4: Hey, @.$0#$e#You go to the caves often, right?$0#$b#Maybe you could teach some things to Abigail, she'll appreciate it.$0

Entries.Mon4: @, how are you able to explore the caves so easily?$2
Entries.Wed4: I have to improve my swordsmanship more...$2
Entries.Sun4: Ugh... I can't stop thinking about bats...$2

Entries.Tue6: I should check on Abigail later...$0
Entries.Wed6: I hope Abigail can talk to her parents soon, it'll be good for them.$0
Entries.Fri6: Abigail and I have so much in common.$1
Entries.Sat6: Hey, @.$0#$b#Could you check on Abigail if you see her?$0

Entries.Tue6: Sebastian knows how to comfort me.$0#$e#He's a great guy.$1
Entries.Thu6: *sigh*$2#$e#When should I talk to them...?$2#$e#Oh, hello, @.$6
Entries.Sat6: I should go and talk to Sebastian again...$2
Entries.Sun6: Hi, @.$0#$e#You're my friend, so I want to know your opinion too.$0#$b#Sebastian told me I have to talk to my parents about how I feel, but I don't know...$2

Entries.Mon8: Hey, @.$0#$e#I'm having a terrible day...$2#$b#I should go and see Abby to feel better.$7#$e#Bye.$0
Entries.Tue8: Do you believe in soulmates, @?$0#$e#I thought it was just some stupid belief.$0#$b# But now I can't even imagine living without Abby.$4
Entries.Wed8: Abby and I have been friends for so long.$0#$e#I kinda regret not telling her how I felt earlier...$2#$b#Guess I thought she wouldn't feel the same and it'd ruin our friendship...$2#$e#But it's cool now, we're really happy together.$1
Entries.Thu8: Hey, @.$0#$e#I ordered Blue Starfruit to play with Abby.$1#$b#She was really excited when the release was announced.$1#$e#Oh, you can come and play too.$7
Entries.Fri8: I love being with Abby, even if we just stay in silence.$4#$b#With her not even silences are awkward.$7#$e#It's a weird feeling... but I like it.$4
Entries.Sat8: It'd be so boring to live here without Abby.$0#$e#Oh, and also Sam and you.$1
Entries.Sun8: Sometimes my job is really stressful...$2#$e#Luckily Abby knows this and comes around when I most need her.$4
Entries.spring_Thu8: Before I didn't feel like doing anything...$2#$e#But, you know, I think spending time with Abby has helped me to be more positive towards life in general.$1
Entries.spring_Fri8: Some days I just want to stay in my bed all day.$2#$b#But Abby wouldn't like that...$0#$e#I should cheer up, I don't want her to be worried.$0
Entries.spring_Sun8: Hey, @.$0#$e#You know that Abby has always wanted to explore the mines, right?$0#$b#Well, if you happen to see her, take care of her, okay?$0#$e#I don't even want to think about her getting hurt...$2
Entries.summer_Mon8: I can't wait for it to be fall already. Summer just isn't my thing.$0#$b#But Abby told me she wanted to go swimming, so I guess I'll do it for her.$0
Entries.summer_Tue8: Summer is the perfect season to focus on my job.$0#$e#But it's difficult sometimes because Abby likes to show up unexpectedly.$0#$e#It's not like I don't like it, though.$4
Entries.summer_Sat8: Sam hasn't stopped teasing Abby and I...$0#$b#He just keeps complaining about being the third wheel.$0
Entries.fall_Tue8: Hey, @.$0#$e#Abby and I don't want to move to the city anymore, but we still want to take a trip there sometime.$0#$e#We're going to go on my motorbike, she's excited to ride it again.$1
Entries.fall_Fri8: Hey, @.$0#$e#Are you coming to the saloon today?$0#$b#Abby and I will play some Prairie King. I think that we'll soon be able to beat it.$1
Entries.fall_Sat8: Fall brings me so many memories from my childhood...$0#$e#Abby and I used to play near the Wizard's Tower.$0#$b#She's always loved visiting the forest.$1
Entries.winter_Thu8: Abby's face turns red because of the cold.$7#$b#She looks really cute.$1
Entries.winter_Fri8: Hey, @.$0#$e#When Abby came to my house the other day she took a hoodie.$0#$b#Should I ask her to give it back to me?$0#$e#No... I think it's better that she keeps it.$0#$e#She looks cute in it.$4
Entries.winter_Sun8: Hey, @.$0#$e#A new year's coming, huh?$0#$e#I'm sort of uneasy...$2#$b#But it makes me feel better to think Abby'll still be by my side.$4
Entries.spring_23: Ugh... I don't like the Flower Dance at all...$5#$b#Well, Abby is going to be there with me, so I guess it won't be that bad.$0
Entries.summer_16: Tomorrow's Sam's birthday.$0#$e#Abby told me I should let him win at pool this Friday.$1
Entries.fall_13: Abby's birthday is today.$1#$b#I ordered a special amethyst from Clint's for her.$1
Entries.fall_26: I'm looking forward to the Spirit's Eve, it's my favorite festival.$7#$e#I never enter the haunted maze, though.$0#$b#But Abby told me I should join her, so I guess I will.$1
Entries.spring_23_2: Ugh... I don't like the Flower Dance at all...$5#$b#Well, Abby is going to be there with me, so I guess it won't be that bad.$0
Entries.summer_16_2: Tomorrow's Sam's birthday.$0#$e#Abby told me I should let him win at pool this Friday.$1
Entries.fall_13_2: Abby's birthday is today.$1#$b#I ordered a special amethyst from Clint's for her.$1
Entries.fall_26_2: I'm looking forward to the Spirit's Eve, it's my favorite festival.$7#$e#I never enter the haunted maze, though.$0#$b#But Abby told me I should join her, so I guess I will.$1

Entries.Mon8: I used to think Pelican Town was a boring place.$0#$b#My dream was to move to the city and live some adventures.$1#$e#But now I don't know anymore...$0#$b#I feel like this is the ideal place for Sebastian and me to live.
Entries.Tue8: It's still early to say, but if Seb and I have kids, I'll make sure that they can be whatever they want.$0#$e#The most important thing's that they're happy with their lives.$0
Entries.Wed8: I don't know how many times I've wished to have been born in the city...$2#$b#But, on second thought, I wouldn't have met Seb that way.$0
Entries.Thu8: Seb's a really reserved person, you know.$0#$b#That's why I'm extra glad he opens up to me.$1
Entries.Fri8: I love Fridays.$1#$b#Today I'm going to play Prairie King with Seb.$0#$b#Maybe we'll finally beat it!$1
Entries.Sat8: I've been planning on exploring the mines with Seb since forever.$0#$b#But he doesn't seem convinced, I think he's worried about me...$2
Entries.Sun8: Seb and I basically grew up together.$0#$e#Our mothers were good friends and we ended up being being really close.$0#$e#I don't know what I'd do without him...$4
Entries.spring_Mon8: Ugh... Hi, @...$3#$e#I didn't sleep well... Seb and I played Solarion Chronicles all night...$3#$e#But it was totally worth it! We had so much fun.$1
Entries.spring_Tue8: Hi, @.$1#$e#Oh, why am I so happy? It's because last night Seb appeared in my dream.$1#$b#But don't ask me more, I can't tell you what happened...$4
Entries.spring_Wed8: You know, @, I feel that since I started dating Seb, my relationship with my parents has also improved.$0#$e#I think they're finally understanding that I'm not a child anymore.$0
Entries.summer_Tue8: I'm glad Seb lives on the mountain.$0#$b#The air up there is refreshing on summer days.$1#$e#Also, when it rains, frogs appear by the lake. Maybe Seb and I should adopt one.$1
Entries.summer_Thu8: Hi, @.$1#$e#Don't think Seb and I are weirdos, but we love to hang out at the cementery.$0#$b#It's almost the only place in town where you can be alone.$0
Entries.summer_Fri8: I asked Seb to come with me to the beach as a joke. You know, he doesn't really like the heat.$0#$b#But he actually told me he'd come if that's what I wanted.$1#$e#He's so cute sometimes...$4
Entries.fall_Mon8: I hope it rains soon.$0#$b#The lake by Seb's house is the best place to hang out on rainy days.$0#$e#Anyway, I'm visiting him today.$1
Entries.fall_Sat8: I love fall days.$0#$b#I wish this season could last forever, it reminds me of when Seb and I played in the forest as kids.$0
Entries.fall_Sun8: Seb's going to help me dye my hair later.$1#$b#I was thinking of sticking to purple, but Seb said blue would also look cool.$0
Entries.winter_Wed8: Winters here in town are so cold.$0#$b#Seb and I like to drink a hot cup of coffee in the morning to warm up for the day.$1
Entries.winter_Fri8: I should visit Seb today.$0#$b#You know, if he's alone for too long, he gets kind of lost in himself.$2
Entries.winter_Sat8: A new year is coming...$0#$e#This was a great year, I made so many memories with Seb.$1#$b#I hope next year is even better for us.$4
Entries.spring_12: The Egg Hunt's tomorrow.$1#$e#Guess you'll be joining this year too.$0#$b#Good luck, @, but this year I feel extra confident because Seb will be cheering me on.$1
Entries.spring_23: Hi, @.$0#$e#Do you remember? Tomorrow's the Flower Dance.$1#$e#I don't really like wearing dresses, but dancing with Seb is fun.$1
Entries.fall_26: I can't wait for the Spirit's Eve Festival.$1#$b#Seb and I are going to share Gus's special pumpkin pie.$1#$e#And maybe he'll want to join me in the haunted maze later.$0
Entries.winter_10: My mother helped me cook some sashimi for Seb's birthday.$1
Entries.spring_12_2: The Egg Hunt's tomorrow.$1#$e#Guess you'll be joining this year too.$0#$b#Good luck, @, but this year I feel extra confident because Seb will be cheering me on.$1
Entries.spring_23_2: Hi, @.$0#$e#Do you remember? Tomorrow's the Flower Dance.$1#$e#I don't really like wearing dresses, but dancing with Seb is fun.$1
Entries.fall_26_2: I can't wait for the Spirit's Eve Festival.$1#$b#Seb and I are going to share Gus's special pumpkin pie.$1#$e#And maybe he'll want to join me in the haunted maze later.$0
Entries.winter_10_2: My mother helped me cook some sashimi for Seb's birthday.$1

Entries.Tue6: My relationship with Sebastian has improved so much lately.$0#$b#He's been in a better mood since he started dating Abigail.$1
Entries.Tue8: Abigail and I talked about exploring the mines.$0#$b#She wants to explore and I want to do research on the minerals of the valley.$0#$e#Maybe you could join too, @.$1
Entries.Fri8: Abigail came to the clinic yesterday and gave me a fresh cauliflower from her dad's store.$1#$e#Sebastian is dating a great woman.$0
Entries.Sun4: It's weird to see Sebastian dating someone.$0#$b#I thought he wasn't interested.$0
Entries.Sun8: Caroline and Pierre came to have dinner with my parents last Wednesday.$0#$e#Caroline shared her cheese cauliflower recipe with them.$1

Entries.Mon6: Abigail comes around often. I'm glad that she cares so much for Sebastian.$0
Entries.Tue10: Abigail's such a great influence for Sebastian.$1#$b#He's so smiley and has been spending more time outdoors. I'm so thankful to Abigail.$1
Entries.Thu2: I knew that Abigail and Sebastian were good friends, but I'd never thought about them dating.$0
Entries.Thu6: Abigail's such a good girl, Caroline must be proud of her.$1
Entries.Fri10: I couldn't be happier that Sebastian is dating Abigail.$1#$b#She's a great girl and the perfect match for him.$0
Entries.Sun8: Oh, @.$1#$e#Caroline and Pierre are coming over to have dinner with us today.$0#$b#Caroline said she's making us her special tea.$1
Entries.Sun10: Caroline and I are delighted that Abigail and Sebastian are together.$0#$b#I hope we officially become family soon.$1

Entries.Mon4: I'm so relieved that Sebastian has started dating Abigail...$0
Entries.Mon10: I have to ask Robin when Abigail is coming to our house.$0#$b#Maru and I found an uncommon type of amethyst and we wanted to give it to her.$1
Entries.Sun8: Hello, @.$0#$b#Sebastian and Abigail are a good match, don't you think?.$1

Entries.Tue6: I hope Abigail's doing well with Sebastian.$0
Entries.Tue10: I hope Sebastian and his family come to have dinner with us soon.$1#$e#Caroline and I have been looking forward to showing off our special pumpkin soup.$0#$e#I'm going to tell Abigail.$1
Entries.Wed4: I'm worried about Abigail...$2#$e#I hope she knows what she wants for her future.$2
Entries.Wed10: I used to worry about Abigail.$0#$b#It's really difficult to be a parent...$2#$e#But now I think she's doing great with Sebastian, they're good to each other.$0
Entries.Thu2: I've known Sebastian for a long time and I'm not sure about Abigail and him...$2
Entries.Thu8: Sebastian has offered to help me with the store's inventory.$0#$b#He told me it can be done much more efficiently by creating a internal database.$0
Entries.Sat4: Sebastian comes to play videogames with Abigail too often.$3
Entries.Sat10: Hello, @.$1#$e#Demetrius has been coming with Robin on Tuesdays.$0#$b#He's doing research about my products.$1

Entries.Mon2: I'm afraid that Abigail will want to travel around with Sebastian...$2
Entries.Mon6: Hello, @.$0#$e#I'm going to cook some sashimi to thank Sebastian for taking care of Abigail.$1
Entries.Tue4: When did Abigail grow up so much?$2#$e#It seems like yesterday when Robin and I used to take her and Sebastian to the playground.$0
Entries.Tue10: Hello, @.$0#$e#Robin and I can't stop talking about Abigail and Sebastian.$0#$b#They're so cute to each other.$1
Entries.Fri8: I had my doubts about the relationship between Abigail and Sebastian, but he actually has helped Abigail to open up to us.$0#$e#I'm thankful to him.$1
Entries.Fri10: Sebastian will always be welcome in my house.$1#$b#And also his family, of course.$1
Entries.Sun4: My little girl's all grown up now.$0#$e#It didn't even cross my mind that Abigail would have a boyfriend so soon.$0
Entries.Sun10: Oh, @, do you think I might have grandkids any time soon?$1

Entries.Mon2: I've been waiting forever for Sebastian and Abigail to start dating.$0#$e#It was so obvious, don't you agree, @?$1
Entries.fall_Wed8: Hey, @.$0#$e#Lately I've been mastering my third wheeling skills.$1
Entries.Fri6: Sebastian and Abigail are my friends and I enjoy going with them to the saloon on Fridays.$0#$e#...But since they started dating, sometimes it's awkward to be there with them.$2#$e#Oh, but of course I'm happy for them.$1
Entries.spring_Sun8: Sebastian comes to my house to play the keyboard more often lately.$0#$b#Maybe he's trying to impress Abigail or something.$1

Entries.spring.001: Oh... What're you doing here, @?$0#$b#I was talking to Abby...$0
Entries.spring.002: Maybe we'll get to the final boss today.$1
Entries.summer.001: Abby was right, this place is so peaceful.$0
Entries.summer.002: Maybe we'll see the Wizard someday, Abby.$1
Entries.fall.001: Do you want to go to the desert with me someday, Abby?$1
Entries.fall.002: Don't tell Sam, but I'm glad he was busy today.$1
Entries.winter.002: I'm saving up money to travel around with Abby.$1

Entries.spring.001: Seb's house is in the most beautiful place in the valley.$0
Entries.spring.002: I think we got this, Seb!$1
Entries.summer.001: Hi, @.$0#$b#Do you think it's kinda weird to hang out here...?
Entries.fall.001: It'd be fun to explore the desert.$1
Entries.fall.002: Seb's teaching me how to play Solarion Chronicles.$1
Entries.winter.001: Maybe I'll take another of Seb's hoodies.$1
Entries.winter.002: I really want to travel abroad with Seb someday.$4

Do you want to take a look at the caves?$0#$b#I've always wanted to go.$1"/pause 700/speak Sebastian "Well... Okay, why not?$7"/pause 1200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation Mine/warp Sebastian 22 9/warp Abigail 23 8/faceDirection Abigail 2/faceDirection Sebastian 1/playMusic Upper_Ambient/showFrame Abigail 27/showFrame Sebastian 17/viewport 20 9 true/pause 1350/speak Abigail "This is amazing!$1"/pause 750/speak Abigail "What do you think will be down there?$0#$b#Now I really want to explore the mines.$1"/pause 800/speak Sebastian "Be careful, it's dangerous to go so near the entrance...$0"/pause 600/speak Abigail "Don't worry! We're safe here.$1"/pause 800/playSound batFlap/pause 500/playSound batFlap/pause 500/playSound batFlap/pause 500/playSound batFlap/pause 380/speak Sebastian "Did you hear that?$0"/pause 650/emote Abigail 8/pause 1600/specificTemporarySprite abbyManyBats/playSound batScreech/showFrame Abigail 32/shake Abigail 2000/pause 1300/showFrame Abigail 0/emote Sebastian 16/pause 500/speak Sebastian "Are you okay?!$2"/pause 800/speak Abigail "That was horrifying...$7"/pause 900/speak Abigail "Maybe I'm not ready for this...$2"/pause 500/emote Abigail 28/pause 800/speak Abigail "Let's go back, okay?$2#$b#I need time to recover from this...$2"/pause 500/emote Sebastian 28/pause 1600/end dialogue Abigail "How do you even dare to go down the mines...?$2"

Entries.59020023/e 59020022/f Sebastian 1500/f A: sadpiano/14 41/farmer 1000 1000 2 Sebastian 26 42 3 Abigail 14 40 2/skippable/pause 1800/emote Abigail 28/pause 800/move Sebastian -7 0 3/pause 500/emote Sebastian 8/pause 700/move Sebastian -5 0 0/pause 380/speak Sebastian "...Abigail?$0#$b#Are you... crying?$2"/pause 390/emote Abigail 16/pause 500/speak Abigail "...$2"/pause 650/speak Sebastian "What's wrong?$2"/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "Oh... It's okay if you don't want to tell me.$0"/pause 1500/speak Abigail "I... I had a huge fight with my parents earlier...$2"/pause 800/speak Abigail "We weren't even arguing about anything in particular...$2"/pause 1100/speak Abigail "I feel like they don't even try to understand me.$2"/pause 500/speak Abigail "They keep criticizing me because everything I do is wrong.$5#$b#And that's not true...$2#$b#It's just that everything has to be done their way no matter what.$2"/pause 1300/speak Abigail "I know I might be wrong sometimes, but can't they let me learn by myself?$5"/pause 600/emote Abigail 28/pause 1200/speak Abigail "I'm so tired of all the arguing...$2"/pause 1200/speak Sebastian "I know how you feel, Abby.$2#$b#I also used to fight a lot with my mother and Demetrius.$2"/pause 1200/speak Sebastian "When they got married and Maru was born, I felt like I wasn't a part of the family anymore...$2#$b#I was so angry at them because all they talked about was Maru...$5#$b#And I started misbehaving...$2#$b#I argued with Maru, didn't go to school, ran away from home for days...$2"/pause 1200/speak Sebastian "I was a kid back then, so maybe that was my way of getting attention from them.$2"/pause 800/speak Sebastian "I was just so jealous of Maru. She's always been smart and had her dad by her side.$2"/pause 800/emote Sebastian 40/pause 1200/speak Sebastian "My behaviour only worsened our relationship...$2#$b#I used to say really awful things to Maru and Demetrius...$2"/pause 1200/speak Sebastian "Over time I realized I never really gave Demetrius a chance.$2#$b#And the fights I started with Maru made no sense at all.$2#$b#I had so much anger inside me...$2"/pause 1500/speak Sebastian "One day I decided I had to talk to them seriously.$0#$b#You know, being angry forever wasn't going to help anyone.$2"/pause 1300/speak Sebastian "I remember it was a Friday, my mother and Demetrius went to the saloon and Maru was in her room.$0#$b#When they returned, I asked them and Maru to come to the kitchen.$0#$b#They were so surprised I was actually talking to them...$2"/pause 900/speak Sebastian "I was so nervous...$0#$b#I couldn't even think straight...$2"/pause 1200/speak Sebastian "...And I just blurted everything out.$0"/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "I told them how I felt, how I wanted things to change between us.$0#$b#I apologised for... everything.$2"/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "Then, my mother asked me what could they do for me to feel better.$0#$b#I think that was the turning point, you know?$0"/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "I told each of them what things they did that upset me.$0#$b#And then they did the same.$0"/pause 1100/speak Sebastian "We all promised to improve ourselves that day.$0"/pause 1500/speak Sebastian "After that, it finally felt like we were a family.$0"/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "It's true that right now we're not at our best, but it's because we have different lifestyles.$0"/pause 1200/speak Sebastian "But it really helped us to be honest with each other.$0#$b#Maybe that's what you need, to talk to them.$0#$b#But not just to criticize the things you don't like, but also to tell them what they can do to understand you better.$0"/pause 600/emote Abigail 12/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "I know it might be hard to be honest with your parents about your feelings, but it's worth it, Abby.$0"/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "Look, why don't we go to my house and you think about it for a while?$1"/pause 1200/speak Abigail "Yeah, that'll be the best...$2#$b#Thank you, Seb...$6"/pause 1500/end dialogue Sebastian "Abigail is going through so much...$2#$b#I hope I can help.$0"

Entries.59020024/e 59020023/f Sebastian 2000/f A: nightTime/-1000 -1000/farmer -1200 1000 0 Abigail 18 35 0 Sebastian -100 -100 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite sebastianOnBike/viewport 17 30/pause 1000/move Abigail 0 -5 0/pause 800/speak Abigail "Hi, Seb.$1#$b#I'm glad I came, I've wanted to see your motorbike for so long.$0"/pause 650/speak Sebastian "Hey, Abby.$7"/pause 900/speak Abigail "I wanted to tell you that I talked to my parents.$0"/pause 500/speak Abigail "It went great!$1#$b#You were right, telling them how I felt and the things I wanted to change was just what we needed.$0#$b#I don't even know how to thank you.$1"/pause 750/speak Sebastian "That's great!$1"/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "Well... maybe I know how you can thank me...$7"/pause 650/speak Sebastian "I was just about to head out.$0#$b#So why don't you hop on? I wanna show you something.$7"/pause 500/emote Abigail 32/pause 1000/move Abigail 0 -1 0/move Abigail 1 0 0 true/pause 120/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Abigail -100 -100/changeToTemporaryMap SebastianRide/specificTemporarySprite sebastianRide/viewport 15 8 true/pause 8000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeToTemporaryMap SebastianMountain/warp Abigail 15 18/warp Sebastian 16 18/playMusic echos/viewport 15 14 true/pause 5000/speak Sebastian "That's Zuzu City in the distance...$0"/pause 700/speak Sebastian "How many times have we talked about going there and starting a new life...?$7"/pause 900/speak Sebastian "I come here when I want to get away from everything and just... think.$0"/pause 1800/speak Sebastian "So, what do you think?$7"/pause 800/speak Abigail "It's beautiful, but it gives me a strange, sad feeling...$6"/pause 800/speak Sebastian "Yeah... That's exactly how I feel, too.$0"/pause 1200/speak Sebastian "Do you still want to move away from the valley?$0"/pause 750/speak Abigail "I don't know anymore...$2#$b#Since I was a kid I've always wanted to have new experiencies, travel around the world...$0"/pause 800/speak Abigail "But now something has changed...$0#$b#I'm really happy to live here, I'm happy we both live here.$4"/pause 900/faceDirection Abigail 1/pause 600/faceDirection Sebastian 3/pause 1500/speak Sebastian "I think I'm happier in the valley too.$7#$b#The city... it just doesn't draw me in like it used to...$4"/pause 1200/speak Sebastian "Abby...$4#$b#I've never brought anyone here before.$4#$b#You know why, right?$4"/pause 700/emote Abigail 20/pause 390/showFrame Sebastian 40/showFrame Abigail 30/positionOffset Sebastian -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset Sebastian -2 0/pause 80/positionOffset Sebastian -2 0/pause 80/positionOffset Sebastian -2 0/pause 80/positionOffset Sebastian -2 0/pause 80/positionOffset Sebastian -2 0/pause 80/positionOffset Sebastian -2 0/pause 80/positionOffset Abigail 2 0/pause 80/positionOffset Abigail 2 0/pause 80/positionOffset Abigail 2 0/pause 80/positionOffset Abigail 2 0/pause 80/positionOffset Abigail 2 0/specificTemporarySprite heart 16 18/pause 2500/viewport move 1 -1 6000/pause 5000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation Mountain/pause 500/end dialogue Abigail "...$4"

welcome.$0#$b#Thank you for joining us on this day.$0"/pause 1600/speak Lewis "Abigail and Sebastian are coming together to proclaim their love through the celebration of their marriage.$0#$b#We are all here to learn about loving and being loved, and we appreciate the opportunity to witness the shared love of this couple.$0"/pause 1600/speak Lewis "Marriage is a very special place.$0#$b#Like the harmony with the melody, marriage weaves two lives together, creating a deeper and richer song.$0"/pause 1600/speak Lewis "We are honored that Abigail and Sebastian are sharing some of their beautiful music with us on this day.$0#$b#And we hope that, as they enter into the lifelong bond that is marriage, they may always see one another in the light of love.$1"/pause 1200/speak Lewis "But first, let's welcome Abigail's mother, Caroline, to say some words.$1"/pause 850/move Caroline 0 -1 1/move Caroline 5 0 0/move Caroline 0 -1 2/pause 850/speak Caroline "I’d like to welcome you all here today to celebrate the marriage of my daughter Abigail and Sebastian.$1#$b#And to thank you for being here on this very special day.$1"/pause 800/faceDirection Caroline 3/pause 650/animate Sebastian true true 150 49/animate Abigail true true 150 37/faceDirection Lewis 1/pause 800/speak Caroline "Abigail...$0#$b#I want you to know you have been the best thing to ever happen to me.$0"/pause 800/speak Caroline "Of course it wasn't always perfect.$2#$b#We disagreed as mothers and daughters sometimes do.$0"/pause 800/speak Caroline "But you've brought me such joy and happiness.$0#$b#I couldn’t be more proud of the beautiful, smart and strong woman you’ve grown into today.$1"/pause 1180/speak Caroline "You're now a wife to a loving husband...$0#$b#I feel so blessed to welcome Sebastian into our lives and thank him for the happiness he brings to my daughter.$1"/pause 800/speak Caroline "I couldn’t wish for a better man for Abby than Sebastian.$0"/pause 1000/speak Caroline "May the two of you have a long, happy and healthy life together.$1"/pause 390/emote Abigail 20/pause 900/move Caroline 0 1 3/move Caroline -5 0 2/move Caroline 0 1 0/pause 200/faceDirection Lewis 2/stopAnimation Abigail...$0#$b#As the Mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and wife!$1"/pause 650/speak Lewis "You may kiss.$1"/pause 1500/stopAnimation Abigail/animate Abigail true true 150 38/showFrame Sebastian 50/positionOffset Sebastian -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Abigail 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Sebastian -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Abigail 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Sebastian -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Abigail 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Sebastian -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Abigail 2 0/specificTemporarySprite heart 29 65/pause 2600/positionOffset Sebastian 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Abigail -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Sebastian 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Abigail -2 0/stopAnimation Abigail/showFrame Abigail 36/pause 380/showFrame Sebastian 48/pause 800/screenFlash .8/playMusic wedding/pause 150/animate Emily false true 320 16 16 16 16 16 16 17 17 17 17 20 20 20 21 21 21 21 18 18 19 19 31 31 31 35 35 34 34 34 22 22 22 22 23 23 23/move Lewis 0 2 1/move Lewis 2 0 1/animate Lewis true true 380 19 19 19 19 19 19 22 23 23 23/animate Marnie true true 380 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 22 23 23 23/pause 300/move Robin -2 0 0/move Robin 0 -1 0/pause 380/emote Robin 32/pause 380/faceDirection Demetrius 1/faceDirection Maru 3/pause 500/faceDirection Vincent 1/faceDirection Jas 3/pause 600/move Pierre 0 -1 1/move Pierre 3 0 0/pause 350/move Jodi 1 0 1/pause 180/faceDirection Caroline 3/pause 200/faceDirection Elliott 3/animate Willy false true 350 28 29 30 31/pause 390/faceDirection Alex 1/pause 180/faceDirection Haley 3/pause 320/faceDirection Evelyn 3/pause 200/faceDirection George 1/pause 390/emote Pierre 28/pause 500/move Wizard 0 12 0/warp Wizard 1000 1000/pause 2500/addConversationTopic AbigailSebastianWedding 4/end

Entries.AbigailSebastianWedding: I never imagined I'd get married so soon...$0#$e#...or married at all.$0#$e#But don't get me wrong, I'm really happy right now.$1
You know, Seb has always been a very special person for me.$0#$b#And now I can spend the rest of my like with him.$4
I didn't expect Abigail would get married so soon.$0#$e#Maybe I should have spent more time with her when I could...$2
Sometimes I think that Sam would be better for Abigail than Sebastian.$0#$e#...I was just joking.$1#$b#Sebastian is a nice young man.$1
I always knew there was something going on between Abigail and Seb.$0#$b#Guess Sam's intuition never fails.$1
I know Sebastian and I don't always get along, but I'm really happy for him and Abigail.$0
Caroline was more nervous than Abigail at the wedding.$0#$b#When she was giving the speech I could she her trembling!$1
The wedding was so much fun, there was a lot of Pink Cake!$1
A couple of days before the wedding Sebastian came to our house.$0#$e#I saw him talking to my brother...$3#$b#He was so happy about getting married that he started to cry!$3
There aren't many weddings here in Pelican Town.$0#$e#It's always nice to see all these young people in love.$1
A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.$0#$b#I hope Abigail and Sebastian live a long happy life together.$1

Ah... weddings...$0#$e#They remind me of this poem...$0#$e#'May you take on the world together with all your hopes and dreams$0#$b#May you be each other's sun and moon as your destinies unfold$0#$b#And should you lose sight of each other and start to drift apart$0#$b#May you circle back by following the compass of your hearts'$0
The best love is the one that makes you a better person without changing you into someone else.$0#$e#I think Abigail and Sebastian make a great couple.$1
Abigail and Sebastian are a match made in heaven.$0#$b#I'm so happy for them and so proud of Sebastian.$1
The wedding was really nice.$0#$b#I've never seen Sebastian smile so much.$0
I really didn't feel like going to the wedding.$0#$b#But in the end I had a good time.$1
I'm not close to Abigail or Sebastian, but I think everyone could see there was something going on with them.$0
Ahoy there!$0#$b#Were you at the wedding the other day?$1

Entries.Mon8: Hey, @.$0#$e#I'm having a terrible day...$2#$b#I should go and see Abby to feel better.$7#$e#Bye.$0
Entries.Tue8: Do you believe in soulmates, @?$0#$e#I thought it was just some stupid belief.$0#$b# But now I can't even imagine living without Abby.$4
Entries.Thu8: Hey, @.$0#$e#I ordered Blue Starfruit to play with Abby.$1#$b#She was really excited when the release was announced.$1#$e#Oh, you can come and play too.$7
Entries.Sat8: It'd be so boring to live here without Abby.$0#$e#Oh, and also Sam and you.$1
Entries.spring_Fri8: Some days I just want to stay in my bed all day.$2#$b#But Abby wouldn't like that...$0#$e#I should cheer up, I don't want her to be worried.$0
Entries.spring_Sun8: Hey, @.$0#$e#You know that Abby has always wanted to explore the mines, right?$0#$b#Well, if you happen to see her, take care of her, okay?$0#$e#I don't even want to think about her getting hurt...$2
Entries.summer_Mon8: I can't wait for it to be fall already. Summer just isn't my thing.$0#$b#But Abby told me she wanted to go swimming, so I guess I'll do it for her.$0
Entries.summer_Sat8: Sam hasn't stopped teasing Abby and I...$0#$b#He just keeps complaining about being the third wheel.$0
Entries.fall_Fri8: Hey, @.$0#$e#Are you coming to the saloon today?$0#$b#Abby and I will play some Prairie King. I think that we'll soon be able to beat it.$1
Entries.winter_Fri8: Hey, @.$0#$e#When Abby came to my house the other day she took a hoodie.$0#$b#Should I ask her to give it back to me?$0#$e#No... I think it's better that she keeps it.$0#$e#She looks cute in it.$4
Entries.summer_16: Tomorrow's Sam's birthday.$0#$e#Abby told me I should let him win at pool this Friday.$1
Entries.fall_13: Abby's birthday is today.$1#$b#I ordered a special amethyst from Clint's for her.$1
Entries.fall_26: I'm looking forward to the Spirit's Eve, it's my favorite festival.$7#$e#I never enter the haunted maze, though.$0#$b#But Abby told me I should join her, so I guess I will.$1
Entries.summer_16_2: Tomorrow's Sam's birthday.$0#$e#Abby told me I should let him win at pool this Friday.$1
Entries.fall_13_2: Abby's birthday is today.$1#$b#I ordered a special amethyst from Clint's for her.$1
Entries.fall_26_2: I'm looking forward to the Spirit's Eve, it's my favorite festival.$7#$e#I never enter the haunted maze, though.$0#$b#But Abby told me I should join her, so I guess I will.$1

Entries.Wed8: Abby and I have been friends for so long.$0#$e#I kinda regret not telling her how I felt earlier...$2#$b#Guess I thought she wouldn't feel the same and it'd ruin our friendship...$2#$e#But it's cool now, we're happily married.$4
Entries.Fri8: I love being with Abby, even if we just stay in silence.$4#$b#With her not even silences are awkward.$7#$e#It's a weird feeling... but I like it.$4#$b#Are all married couples like us?$4
Entries.Sun8: Sometimes my job is really stressful...$2#$e#Luckily Abby knows this and comes around when I most need her.$4#$b#It feels like a dream to be married to her...$4
Entries.spring_Thu8: Before I didn't feel like doing anything...$2#$e#But, you know, I think spending time with Abby and marrying her has helped me to be more positive towards life in general.$1
Entries.summer_Tue8: Summer is the perfect season to focus on my job.$0#$e#But it's difficult sometimes because Abby likes to show up unexpectedly.$0#$e#She says that as my wife she has the right to come whenever she wants.$1
Entries.fall_Tue8: Hey, @.$0#$e#Abby and I don't want to move to the city anymore, but we still decided to go there for our honeymoon.$0#$e#It was a really special trip.$1
Entries.fall_Sat8: Fall brings me so many memories from my childhood...$0#$e#Abby and I used to play near the Wizard's Tower.$0#$b#She's always loved visiting the forest.$1#$e#Now that we are married, we're thinking of moving there together.$1
Entries.winter_Thu8: Abby's face turns red because of the cold.$7#$b#My wife is just too cute.$1
Entries.winter_Sun8: Hey, @.$0#$e#Looks like a new year is coming, huh?$0#$e#I'm sort of uneasy...$2#$b#But I feel better when I think I'm married to Abby and she'll be by my side.$4
Entries.spring_23_2: Ugh... I don't like the Flower Dance at all...$5#$e#Well, Abby is going to be there with me, so I guess it won't be that bad.$1#$e#The benefits of marriage...$4

Entries.Mon8: I used to think Pelican Town was a boring place.$0#$b#My dream was to move to the city and live some adventures.$1#$e#But now I don't know anymore...$0#$b#I feel like this is the ideal place for Sebastian and me to live.
Entries.Fri8: I love Fridays.$1#$b#Today I'm going to play Prairie King with Seb.$0#$b#Maybe we'll finally beat it!$1
Entries.Sat8: I've been planning on exploring the mines with Seb since forever.$0#$b#But he doesn't seem convinced, I think he's worried about me...$2
Entries.spring_Mon8: Ugh... Hi, @...$3#$e#I didn't sleep well... Seb and I played Solarion Chronicles all night...$3#$e#But it was totally worth it! We had so much fun.$1
Entries.spring_Tue8: Hi, @.$1#$e#Oh, why am I so happy? It's because last night Seb appeared in my dream.$1#$b#But don't ask me more, I can't tell you what happened...$4
Entries.spring_Wed8: You know, @, I feel that since I started dating Seb, my relationship with my parents has also improved.$0#$e#I think they're finally understanding that I'm not a child anymore.$0
Entries.summer_Tue8: I'm glad Seb lives on the mountain.$0#$b#The air up there is refreshing on summer days.$1#$e#Also, when it rains, frogs appear by the lake. Maybe Seb and I should adopt one.$1
Entries.fall_Mon8: I hope it rains soon.$0#$b#The lake by Seb's house is the best place to hang out on rainy days.$0#$e#Anyway, I'm visiting him today.$1
Entries.fall_Sun8: Seb's going to help me dye my hair later.$1#$b#I was thinking of sticking to purple, but Seb said blue would also look cool.$0
Entries.winter_Wed8: Winters here in town are so cold.$0#$b#Seb and I like to drink a hot cup of coffee in the morning to warm up for the day.$1
Entries.spring_23: Hi, @.$0#$e#Do you remember? Tomorrow's the Flower Dance.$1#$e#I don't really like wearing dresses, but dancing with Seb is fun.$1
Entries.fall_26: I can't wait for the Spirit's Eve Festival.$1#$b#Seb and I are going to share Gus's special pumpkin pie.$1#$e#And maybe he'll want to join me in the haunted maze later.$0
Entries.spring_23_2: Hi, @.$0#$e#Do you remember? Tomorrow's the Flower Dance.$1#$e#I don't really like wearing dresses, but dancing with Seb is fun.$1
Entries.fall_26_2: I can't wait for the Spirit's Eve Festival.$1#$b#Seb and I are going to share Gus's special pumpkin pie.$1#$e#And maybe he'll want to join me in the haunted maze later.$0

Entries.Tue8: After our wedding Seb and I have been thinking about having kids.$0#$e#Of course, we'll make sure they can be whatever they want.$0#$b#The most important thing is that they're happy with their lives.$1
Entries.Wed8: I don't know how many times I've wished to have been born in the city...$2#$b#But, on second thought, I wouldn't have met Seb that way.$0#$e#Our wedding was the most special day in my life, I wouldn't change it for anything.$1
Entries.Thu8: Seb's a really reserved person, you know.$0#$b#That's why I'm extra glad he opens up to me.$0#$b#Communication is important for a good marriage.$1
Entries.Sun8: Seb and I basically grew up together.$0#$e#Our mothers were good friends and we ended up being being really close.$0#$b#At the wedding my mom told me she always knew we had a special connection.#$e#I don't know what I'd do without him...$4
Entries.summer_Thu8: Hi, @.$1#$e#Don't think Seb and I are weirdos, but we love to hang out at the cementery.$0#$b#It's almost the only place in town where you can be alone.$0#$e#But now that we're married, we aare going to move in together soon.$1
Entries.summer_Fri8: I asked Seb to come with me to the beach as a joke. You know, he doesn't really like the heat.$0#$b#But he actually told me he'd come if that's what I wanted.$1#$e#He's the cutest husband...$4
Entries.fall_Sat8: I love fall days.$0#$b#I wish this season could last forever, it reminds me of when Seb and I played in the forest as kids.$0#$e#Now that we're married, we should start thinking about having our own children, don't you think?$0
Entries.winter_Fri8: I should visit Seb today.$0#$b#You know, if he's alone for too long, he gets kind of lost in himself.$2#$e#But it's true that since we got married he has been more lively.$1
Entries.winter_Sat8: A new year is coming...$0#$e#This was a great year, I made so many memories with Seb.$0#$b#Married couples can also have fun, you know.$1#$e#I hope next year is even better for us.$4
Entries.spring_12: The Egg Hunt's tomorrow.$1#$e#Guess you'll be joining this year too.$0#$b#Good luck, @, but this year I feel extra confident because Seb will be cheering me on.$0#$b#He's the best husband in the world.$1
Entries.winter_10: My mother helped me cook some sashimi for Seb's birthday.$0#$b#Now that we're married, I want to learn how to cook his favorite dishes.$1
Entries.spring_12_2: The Egg Hunt's tomorrow.$1#$e#Guess you'll be joining this year too.$0#$b#Good luck, @, but this year I feel extra confident because Seb will be cheering me on.$0#$b#He's the best husband in the world.$1
Entries.winter_10_2: My mother helped me cook some sashimi for Seb's birthday.$0#$b#Now that we're married, I want to learn how to cook his favorite dishes.$1

Entries.Tue8: Abigail and I talked about exploring the mines.$0#$b#She wants to explore and I want to do research on the minerals of the valley.$0#$e#Maybe you could join too, @.$1
Entries.Sun8: Caroline and Pierre came to have dinner with my parents last Wednesday.$0#$e#Caroline shared her cheese cauliflower recipe with them.$1

Entries.Mon6: My relationship with Sebastian has improved so much lately.$0#$b#He's been in a better mood since he married Abigail.$1
Entries.Fri8: Abigail came to the clinic yesterday and gave me a fresh cauliflower from her dad's store.$1#$e#Sebastian is married to a great woman.$0
Entries.Sat6: It's weird to see Sebastian married.$0#$b#I thought he wasn't interested in that kind of relationship.$0

Entries.Mon6: Abigail comes around often. I'm glad that she cares so much for Sebastian.$0
Entries.Thu2: I knew that Abigail and Sebastian were good friends, but I'd never thought about them dating.$0
Entries.Thu6: Abigail's such a good girl, Caroline must be proud of her.$1
Entries.Fri2: I couldn't be happier that Sebastian is dating Abigail.$1#$b#She's a great girl and the perfect match for him.$0
Entries.Sat8: Oh, @.$1#$e#Caroline and Pierre are coming over to have dinner with us today.$0#$b#Caroline said she's making us her special tea.$1
Entries.Sun2: Caroline and I are delighted that Abigail and Sebastian are together.$0#$b#I hope we officially become family soon.$1

Entries.Tue10: Abigail's such a great influence for Sebastian.$1#$b#He's so smiley and has been spending more time outdoors.$0#$b#I'm so glad they ended up getting married.$1
Entries.Thu4: I knew that Abigail and Sebastian were doing great, but I'd never thought about them getting married so soon.$0
Entries.Fri4: I couldn't be happier that Sebastian is married to Abigail.$1#$b#She's a great girl and the perfect match for him.$0
Entries.Sun4: Caroline and I are delighted that Abigail and Sebastian are together.$0#$b#And now we're officially a family.$1

Entries.Mon2: I'm so relieved that Sebastian has started dating Abigail...$0
Entries.Wed8: I have to ask Robin when Abigail is coming to our house.$0#$b#Maru and I found an uncommon type of amethyst and we wanted to give it to her.$1
Entries.Sun8: Hello, @.$0#$b#Sebastian and Abigail are a good match, don't you think?.$1

Entries.Mon4: I'm so relieved that Sebastian married Abigail...$0

Entries.Mon6: I hope Abigail's doing well with Sebastian.$0
Entries.Tue10: I hope Sebastian and his family come to have dinner with us soon.$1#$e#Caroline and I have been looking forward to showing off our special pumpkin soup.$0#$e#I'm going to tell Abigail.$1
Entries.Wed2: I'm worried about Abigail...$2#$e#I hope she knows what she wants for her future.$2
Entries.Thu2: I've known Sebastian for a long time and I'm not sure about Abigail and him...$2
Entries.Sat4: Sebastian comes to play videogames with Abigail too often.$3
Entries.Sat6: Hello, @.$1#$e#Demetrius has been coming with Robin on Tuesdays.$0#$b#He's doing research about my products.$1

Entries.Tue6: I hope Abigail's doing well with Sebastian.$0
Entries.Tue10: I hope Sebastian and his family come to have dinner with us soon.$1#$e#Caroline and I have been looking forward to showing off our special pumpkin soup.$0#$e#I'm going to tell Abigail.$1
Entries.Wed4: I used to worry about Abigail.$0#$b#It's really difficult to be a parent...$2#$e#But now I think she's doing great with Sebastian, she was so happy at her wedding day.$1
Entries.Thu4: Sebastian has offered to help me with the store's inventory.$0#$b#He told me it can be done much more efficiently by creating a internal database.$0#$b#I don't really understand what he explained to me, so I guess I'll have to trust my son-in-law.$1

Entries.Mon2: I'm afraid that Abigail will want to travel around with Sebastian...$2
Entries.Tue4: When did Abigail grow up so much?$2#$e#It seems like yesterday when Robin and I used to take her and Sebastian to the playground.$0
Entries.Thu8: Oh, @, do you think I might have grandkids any time soon?$1
Entries.Fri8: I had my doubts about the relationship between Abigail and Sebastian, but he actually has helped Abigail to open up to us.$0#$e#I'm thankful to him.$1
Entries.Sun4: My little girl's all grown up now.$0#$e#It didn't even cross my mind that Abigail would have a boyfriend so soon.$0

Entries.Mon6: Hello, @.$0#$e#I'm going to cook some sashimi to thank Sebastian for taking care of Abigail.$1#$e#Abigail has been asking me to teach her how to cook.$0#$b#Since they got married, she has been trying really hard to cook his favorite dishes.$1
Entries.Tue10: Hello, @.$0#$e#Robin and I can't stop talking about Abigail and Sebastian.$0#$b#Even thought they're married now, they're still so cute to each other.$1
Entries.Thu10: Oh, @, do you think I might have grandkids any time soon?$0#$b#I hope they're thinking of having kids now that they're married.$1
Entries.Fri8: I had my doubts about the relationship between Abigail and Sebastian, but he actually has helped Abigail to open up to us.$0#$e#I'm thankful to him.$1
Entries.Sat6: Sebastian will always be welcome in my house.$1#$b#I couldn't hope for a best son-in-law.$1
Entries.Sun6: My little girl's all grown up now.$0#$e#It didn't even cross my mind that Abigail would get married so soon.$0

Entries.Mon2: I've been waiting forever for Sebastian and Abigail to start dating.$0#$e#It was so obvious, don't you agree, @?$1
Entries.fall_Wed8: Hey, @.$0#$e#Lately I've been mastering my third wheeling skills.$1
Entries.Fri4: Sebastian and Abigail are my friends and I enjoy going with them to the saloon on Fridays.$0#$e#...But since they started dating, sometimes it's awkward to be there with them.$2#$e#Oh, but of course I'm happy for them.$1
Entries.spring_Sun8: Sebastian comes to my house to play the keyboard more often lately.$0#$b#Maybe he's trying to impress Abigail or something.$1

Entries.Mon4: I waited forever for Sebastian and Abigail to start dating.$0#$b#It's cool that they got married in the end.$1
Entries.Fri6: Sebastian and Abigail are my friends and I enjoy going with them to the saloon on Fridays.$0#$e#...But since they got married, sometimes it's awkward to be there with them.$2#$e#Oh, but of course I'm happy for them.$1

Entries.spring.001: Seb's house is in the most beautiful place in the valley.$0#$b#Maybe we could build a little house up on the mountains.$0#$b#We really want to move in together since we'r married now.$1
Entries.spring.002: I think we got this, Seb!$1
Entries.summer.001: Hi, @.$0#$b#Do you think it's kinda weird to hang out here...?
Entries.summer.002: Seb's always caring for me.$4#$b#He's the best husband in the world...$4
Entries.fall.001: It'd be fun to explore the desert.$1#$b#We should have visited it on our honeymoon, don't you think Seb?
Entries.fall.002: Seb's teaching me how to play Solarion Chronicles.$1
Entries.winter.001: Maybe I'll take another of Seb's hoodies.$0#$b#You know, as his wife I think it's my right to do so.$1
Entries.winter.002: I really want to travel abroad with Seb someday.$4
